answers.answer: no i forgot about that.  well he was the origional neuro so i am now going to go back to my neuomuscular doc so i def mention it to him

well they are neurological.muscle spasms, twitching, burning, pins and needles, etc and excuciationg electric shock like pain in entire legs and arms, stabbing pain in eery part of body.   so many test all normal
ya i am thinking to go back to rhumatologist and talk to my general doc.  she is pretty understanding and does it for atleast peace of mind.

i donta have diabetes.  the rhumatologist mentioned fibro but the neuoromucular specialist dosent think so.  he said my sysmptoms are nerve related.  when firring is off it causes hese problems and that signals not going right.  so why the nerves are actin glike this they cant figure it out.

hii know how you feel.  i do the same thing.  the internet is so addictve.  you know for me i think ignorance IS BLISS...lolits hard not to look and when we look all kinds of **** comes up.  i have thought about mercury.  especially in teeth filling.  i am going to go to the dentist and get mine taken out.  some one told me about a women who had these problems.  went to all kinds of docs and no one could figure it out untill she got mercury fillings out and all sysmptoms went away.

Your symptoms sound similar to mine. I got very sick 3 yrs ago. It started out with severe pain all over and fatigue. Then, the real pain came. It started in my feet and gradually asended up my body a foot at a time. Every time I woke up, it was a foot higher and I slept for 2-3 days in a row. I twitched so badly, that whatever was in my hand flew across the room. I had electrical headaches that woke me up at night along with severe night sweats that made me so cold. I have shooting pains that go up my arms now. I became so fatigued and weak at one point, I couldn't move my extremities. I was diagnosed with fibromyalgia at first, but now my doctors call me a mystery. I have a high ANA, RNA antibodies, tested positive for Parvovirus and Epstein Barre virus. EMG said carpal tunnel in left arm and mildly abnormal in left legs. I have severe cold, freezing pain in feet and legs. My muscles feel like I've been working out and the pain is like a burning pain. It's hard to discribes, but it's like the pain when your working out and you have to stop lifting weights bc it hurts to bad to keep going. MRI showed flashes of white matter, EMG normal but I had a seizure type thing in front of my neurologist. My sleep study was really abnormal and showed terrible daytime sleepiness. I went into REM sleep within 2-5 min every time they had me go to sleep during the day. I have many other symptoms. I can't get my doctors to do a spinal tap though. I already have severe headaches and dizziness. I feel worse when I stand up so I'm bedridden and fatigued. My Lymes test was negative. Anyways, I just wanted you to know I feel the same way as you. Sick and frustrated. I just want a correct diagnosis.

question: I went to the nurologist and took what the neurologist recomended.  turns out he has done the blood work up for cancer and it was negative.  he said the CT is unnecesarry.  i explained my stuff again and he said what do you want me to say.its good that all test normal but bad that you still hurting.anyways i have been reffered to pain managemnt.  has any one recieved any real relief from them.
title: no help  from doctor
